title: Eddie Bot
description: A general purpose discord bot with commands ranging from music playing to joke giving.
stack: Java, JDA (Java Discord API), Heroku, Git(hub)

title: Investigation Buddy
description: Cincinnati State capstone project.  A website made for a local townships zoning department.  Helps increase workers productivity by providing a better, more streamlined workflow.

title: Nates Guides
description: League of Legends guide / tips website. Made in highschool to practice web development.

title: 4 Bit Binary Counter
description: This was my first project and introduction into arduino.  I made a simple visual binary adder.  Using 4 leds I displayed the current count and on an LCD screen I displayed the corresponding base 10 number!

title: Snake Game
description: A clone of the classic game Snake.  Made with PyGame, with a SQLite powered leaderboard to encourage competitivness.

media.caption: Gameplay Demo of the Snek Game

title: Strava Data Analysis
description: I often use the popular fitness tracking app Strava to look at the stats of my runs and activities.  I found a python library to access the Strava API and did some anylsis / graphing of my activity data.
stack: Python, Jupyter Notebooks, API, Data Anaylsis, Data Visualization

title: Garmin Watch Data Analysis
description: I am an avid runner. I bought a Garmin watch in January of 2023 to start tracking my runs / general health. Using the data from the watch I made graphs to show my weight loss (150+ pounds), weekly miles ran, average sleep per day of week, etc.  I found an open source library to extract my Garmin Data and have done some anaylsis on my watches data!
stack: Python, Jupyter Notebooks, API, Data Anaylsis, Data Visualization

title: Led Strip
description: My most recent project is an led strip. I programmed a web server to control a 15 meter led strip. I did this using an esp8266 to run and host the web server, an arduino nano to power the strip.

media.caption: Video Demo of The Full Length Strip
A Picture of The Strips Contoller
